ComicInfo.Summary:
“World War” spills into this all-new limited series! As Cybertron descends into a state of war, countless civilians—unaligned with the Autobots, Decepticons, or any faction—are caught in the crossfire. Fortunately, a solution may be coming... Wheeljack, Hound, and some of Cybertron’s greatest (and most infamous) scientists seek to reactivate the Ark program and evacuate the planet with huge spaceships. On the verge of war, will their efforts be enough to escape?
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Beth McGuire-Smith | 1-2 | B | Cover B | Winston Chan | 3 | RI-A | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover A | Sara Pitre-Durocher | 4 | RI-B | 1:25 Retailer Incentive Variant Cover B | Alex Milne (a) & Josh Perez (c) | 5 | RE | KRS Comics/Black Flag Comics Exclusive Variant Cover A (Shockwave) | Raymund Bermudez (a) & Sebastian Cheng (c) | 6 | RE | KRS Comics/Black Flag Comics Exclusive Variant Cover B | Albert Morales (a) & Sebastian Cheng (c) | 7-8 | RE | Wicked Gator Comics/Jolzar Collectibles/Yellow Snow Comics Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 1000 | John Giang | 9-10 |
